## isDocumentEmpty() function

Checks whether the given document is empty

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isDocumentEmpty(
  doc: DocumentState | null,
  plugin: EditorPlugin | null
): boolean
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                              | Description  |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------- | ------------ |
| doc       | [DocumentState](./store.documentstate.md) \| null | The document |
| plugin    | EditorPlugin \| null                              | The plugin   |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

`True` if the specified document is empty
